00117 /***************************************************************************/
00131 Ecode_t DMADRV_AllocateChannel( unsigned int *channelId, void *capabilities )
00132 {
00133   int i;
00134   (void)capabilities;
00135 
00136   if ( !initialized )
00137   {
00138     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00139   }
00140 
00141   if ( channelId == NULL )
00142   {
00143     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00144   }
00145 
00146   INT_Disable();
00147   for ( i=0; i < EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT; i++ )
00148   {
00149     if ( !chTable[ i ].allocated )
00150     {
00151       *channelId             = i;
00152       chTable[ i ].allocated = true;
00153 #if !defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API ) || defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00154       chTable[ i ].callback  = NULL;
00155 #endif
00156       INT_Enable();
00157       return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00158     }
00159   }
00160   INT_Enable();
00161   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CHANNELS_EXHAUSTED;
00162 }
00163 
00164 /***************************************************************************/
00176 Ecode_t DMADRV_DeInit( void )
00177 {
00178   int i;
00179   bool inUse;
00180 
00181   inUse = false;
00182 
00183   INT_Disable();
00184   for ( i=0; i < EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT; i++ )
00185   {
00186     if ( chTable[ i ].allocated )
00187     {
00188       inUse = true;
00189       break;
00190     }
00191   }
00192 
00193   if ( !inUse )
00194   {
00195 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00196     NVIC_DisableIRQ( DMA_IRQn );
00197     DMA->IEN    = _DMA_IEN_RESETVALUE;
00198     DMA->CONFIG = _DMA_CONFIG_RESETVALUE;
00199     CMU_ClockEnable( cmuClock_DMA, false );
00200 #elif defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00201     LDMA_DeInit();
00202 #endif
00203     initialized = false;
00204     INT_Enable();
00205     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00206   }
00207   INT_Enable();
00208 
00209   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_IN_USE;
00210 }

00212 /***************************************************************************/
00223 Ecode_t DMADRV_FreeChannel( unsigned int channelId )
00224 {
00225   if ( !initialized )
00226   {
00227     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00228   }
00229 
00230   if ( channelId > EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT )
00231   {
00232     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00233   }
00234 
00235   INT_Disable();
00236   if ( chTable[ channelId ].allocated )
00237   {
00238     chTable[ channelId ].allocated = false;
00239     INT_Enable();
00240     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00241   }
00242   INT_Enable();
00243 
00244   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_ALREADY_FREED;
00245 }

00247 /***************************************************************************/
00258 Ecode_t DMADRV_Init( void )
00259 {
00260   int i;
00261 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00262   DMA_Init_TypeDef dmaInit;
00263 #elif defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00264   LDMA_Init_t dmaInit = LDMA_INIT_DEFAULT;
00265   dmaInit.ldmaInitCtrlNumFixed = EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_PRIORITY;
00266 #endif
00267 
00268 
00269   INT_Disable();
00270   if ( initialized )
00271   {
00272     INT_Enable();
00273     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_ALREADY_INITIALIZED;
00274   }
00275   initialized = true;
00276   INT_Enable();
00277 
00278   if ( EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_IRQ_PRIORITY > 7 )
00279   {
00280     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00281   }
00282 
00283   for ( i=0; i < EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT; i++ )
00284   {
00285     chTable[ i ].allocated = false;
00286   }
00287 
00288 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00289   NVIC_SetPriority( DMA_IRQn, EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_IRQ_PRIORITY );
00290   dmaInit.hprot        = 0;
00291   dmaInit.controlBlock = dmaControlBlock;
00292   DMA_Init( &dmaInit );
00293 #elif defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00294   dmaInit.ldmaInitIrqPriority = EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_IRQ_PRIORITY;
00295   LDMA_Init( &dmaInit );
00296 #endif
00297 
00298   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00299 }

00331 Ecode_t DMADRV_LdmaStartTransfer( int                channelId,
00332                                   LDMA_TransferCfg_t *transfer,
00333                                   LDMA_Descriptor_t  *descriptor,
00334                                   DMADRV_Callback_t  callback,
00335                                   void               *cbUserParam )

00337   ChTable_t *ch;
00338

00340   {
00341     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00342   }
00343

00345   {
00346     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00347   }
00348

00350   if ( ch->allocated == false )
00351   {
00352     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED;
00353   }
00354 
00355   ch->callback      = callback;
00356   ch->userParam     = cbUserParam;
00357   ch->callbackCount = 0;
00358   LDMA_StartTransfer( channelId, transfer, descriptor );
00359 
00360   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;

00630 /***************************************************************************/
00641 Ecode_t DMADRV_StopTransfer( unsigned int channelId )
00642 {
00643   if ( !initialized )
00644   {
00645     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00646   }
00647 
00648   if ( channelId > EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT )
00649   {
00650     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00651   }
00652 
00653   if ( chTable[ channelId ].allocated == false )
00654   {
00655     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED;
00656   }
00657 
00658 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00659   DMA_ChannelEnable( channelId, false );
00660 #elif defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00661   LDMA_StopTransfer( channelId );
00662 #endif
00663 
00664   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00665 }
00666 
00667 /***************************************************************************/
00681 Ecode_t DMADRV_TransferActive( unsigned int channelId, bool *active )
00682 {
00683   if ( !initialized )
00684   {
00685     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00686   }
00687 
00688   if ( ( channelId > EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT )
00689        || ( active == NULL ) )
00690   {
00691     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00692   }
00693 
00694   if ( chTable[ channelId ].allocated == false )
00695   {
00696     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED;
00697   }
00698 
00699 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00700   if ( DMA_ChannelEnabled( channelId ) )
00701 #elif defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00702   if ( LDMA->CHEN & ( 1 << channelId ) )
00703 #endif
00704   {
00705     *active = true;
00706   }
00707   else
00708   {
00709     *active = false;
00710   }
00711 
00712   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00713 }
00714 
00715 /***************************************************************************/
00733 Ecode_t DMADRV_TransferCompletePending( unsigned int channelId, bool *pending )
00734 {
00735   if ( !initialized )
00736   {
00737     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00738   }
00739 
00740   if ( ( channelId > EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT )
00741        || ( pending == NULL ) )
00742   {
00743     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00744   }
00745 
00746   if ( chTable[ channelId ].allocated == false )
00747   {
00748     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED;
00749   }
00750 
00751 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00752   if ( DMA->IF & ( 1 << channelId ) )
00753 #elif defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00754   if ( LDMA->IF & ( 1 << channelId ) )
00755 #endif
00756   {
00757     *pending = true;
00758   }
00759   else
00760   {
00761     *pending = false;
00762   }
00763 
00764   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00765 }
00766 
00767 /***************************************************************************/
00786 Ecode_t DMADRV_TransferDone( unsigned int channelId, bool *done )
00787 {
00788 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00789   uint32_t remaining, iflag;
00790 #endif
00791 
00792   if ( !initialized )
00793   {
00794     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00795   }
00796 
00797   if ( ( channelId > EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT )
00798        || ( done == NULL ) )
00799   {
00800     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00801   }
00802 
00803   if ( chTable[ channelId ].allocated == false )
00804   {
00805     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED;
00806   }
00807 
00808 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00809   INT_Disable();
00810   /* This works for primary channel only ! */
00811   remaining = ( dmaControlBlock[ channelId ].CTRL
00812                 & _DMA_CTRL_N_MINUS_1_MASK )
00813               >> _DMA_CTRL_N_MINUS_1_SHIFT;
00814   iflag = DMA->IF;
00815   INT_Enable();
00816 
00817   if ( ( remaining == 0 ) && ( iflag & ( 1 << channelId ) ) )
00818   {
00819     *done = true;
00820   }
00821   else
00822   {
00823     *done = false;
00824   }
00825 #elif defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00826   *done = LDMA_TransferDone( channelId );
00827 #endif
00828 
00829   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00830 }
00831 
00832 /***************************************************************************/
00852 Ecode_t DMADRV_TransferRemainingCount( unsigned int channelId,
00853                                   int *remaining )
00854 {
00855 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00856   uint32_t remain, iflag;
00857 #endif
00858 
00859   if ( !initialized )
00860   {
00861     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00862   }
00863 
00864   if ( ( channelId > EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT )
00865        || ( remaining == NULL ) )
00866   {
00867     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00868   }
00869 
00870   if ( chTable[ channelId ].allocated == false )
00871   {
00872     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED;
00873   }
00874 
00875 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA )
00876   INT_Disable();
00877   /* This works for primary channel only ! */
00878   remain = ( dmaControlBlock[ channelId ].CTRL
00879              & _DMA_CTRL_N_MINUS_1_MASK )
00880            >> _DMA_CTRL_N_MINUS_1_SHIFT;
00881   iflag = DMA->IF;
00882   INT_Enable();
00883 
00884   if ( ( remain == 0 ) && ( iflag & ( 1 << channelId ) ) )
00885   {
00886     *remaining = 0;
00887   }
00888   else
00889   {
00890     *remaining = 1 + remain;
00891   }
00892 #elif defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00893   *remaining = LDMA_TransferRemainingCount( channelId );
00894 #endif
00895 
00896   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
00897 }
00898 
00900 
00901 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA )
00902 /***************************************************************************/
00906 void LDMA_IRQHandler( void )
00907 {
00908 #if !defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API )
00909   bool stop;
00910 #endif
00911   ChTable_t *ch;
00912   uint32_t pending, chnum, chmask;
00913 
00914   /* Get all pending and enabled interrupts */
00915   pending  = LDMA->IF;
00916   pending &= LDMA->IEN;
00917 
00918   /* Check for LDMA error */
00919   if ( pending & LDMA_IF_ERROR )
00920   {
00921     /* Loop here to enable the debugger to see what has happened */
00922     while (1)
00923     {
00924       /* Wait forever. */
00925     }
00926   }
00927 
00928   /* Iterate over all LDMA channels. */
00929   for ( chnum = 0,                          chmask = 1;
00930         chnum < EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT;
00931         chnum++,                            chmask <<= 1 )
00932   {
00933     if ( pending & chmask )
00934     {
00935       /* Clear interrupt flag. */
00936       LDMA->IFC = chmask;
00937 
00938       ch = &chTable[ chnum ];
00939       if ( ch->callback != NULL )
00940       {
00941         ch->callbackCount++;
00942 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API )
00943         ch->callback( chnum, ch->callbackCount, ch->userParam );
00944 #else
00945         stop = !ch->callback( chnum, ch->callbackCount, ch->userParam );
00946 
00947         if ( ( ch->mode == dmaModePingPong ) && stop )
00948         {
00949           dmaXfer[ chnum ].desc[0].xfer.link = 0;
00950           dmaXfer[ chnum ].desc[1].xfer.link = 0;
00951         }
00952 #endif
00953       }
00954     }
00955   }
00956 }
00957 #endif /* defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA ) */
00958 
00959 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA ) && !defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API )
00960 /***************************************************************************/
00964 static void DmaBasicCallback( unsigned int channel, bool primary, void *user )
00965 {
00966   ChTable_t *ch = &chTable[ channel ];
00967   (void)user;
00968   (void)primary;
00969 
00970   if ( ch->callback != NULL )
00971   {
00972     ch->callbackCount++;
00973     ch->callback( channel, ch->callbackCount, ch->userParam );
00974   }
00975 }
00976 #endif
00977 
00978 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA ) && !defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API )
00979 /***************************************************************************/
00983 static void DmaPingPongCallback( unsigned int channel, bool primary, void *user )
00984 {
00985   bool stop = true;
00986   ChTable_t *ch = &chTable[ channel ];
00987 
00988   (void)user;
00989 
00990   if ( ch->callback != NULL )
00991   {
00992     ch->callbackCount++;
00993     stop = !ch->callback( channel, ch->callbackCount, ch->userParam );
00994   }
00995 
00996   DMA_RefreshPingPong(  0,
00997                         primary,
00998                         false,
00999                         NULL,
01000                         NULL,
01001                         ch->length - 1,
01002                         stop );
01003 }
01004 #endif
01005 
01006 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA ) && !defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API )
01007 /***************************************************************************/
01011 static Ecode_t StartTransfer( DmaMode_t             mode,
01012                               DmaDirection_t        direction,
01013                               unsigned int          channelId,
01014                               DMADRV_PeripheralSignal_t
01015                                                     peripheralSignal,
01016                               void                  *buf0,
01017                               void                  *buf1,
01018                               void                  *buf2,
01019                               bool                  bufInc,
01020                               int                   len,
01021                               DMADRV_DataSize_t     size,
01022                               DMADRV_Callback_t     callback,
01023                               void                  *cbUserParam )
01024 {
01025   ChTable_t *ch;
01026   DMA_CfgChannel_TypeDef chCfg;
01027   DMA_CfgDescr_TypeDef   descrCfg;
01028 
01029   if ( !initialized )
01030   {
01031     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01032   }
01033 
01034   if ( ( channelId > EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT )
01035        || ( buf0 == NULL )
01036        || ( buf1 == NULL )
01037        || ( len > DMADRV_MAX_XFER_COUNT )
01038        || ( ( mode == dmaModePingPong ) && ( buf2 == NULL ) ) )
01039   {
01040     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
01041   }
01042 
01043   ch = &chTable[ channelId ];
01044   if ( ch->allocated == false )
01045   {
01046     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED;
01047   }
01048 
01049   /* Setup the interrupt callback routine. */
01050   if ( mode == dmaModeBasic )
01051   {
01052     dmaCallBack[ channelId ].cbFunc  = DmaBasicCallback;
01053   }
01054   else
01055   {
01056     dmaCallBack[ channelId ].cbFunc  = DmaPingPongCallback;
01057   }
01058   dmaCallBack[ channelId ].userPtr = NULL;
01059 
01060   /* Setup the channel */
01061   chCfg.highPri = false;              /* Can't use hi pri with peripherals. */
01062 
01063   /* Interrupt needed ? */
01064   if ( ( callback != NULL ) || ( mode == dmaModePingPong ) )
01065   {
01066     chCfg.enableInt = true;
01067   }
01068   else
01069   {
01070     chCfg.enableInt = false;
01071   }
01072   chCfg.select = peripheralSignal;
01073   chCfg.cb     = &dmaCallBack[ channelId ];
01074   DMA_CfgChannel( channelId, &chCfg );
01075 
01076   /* Setup channel descriptor. */
01077   if ( direction == dmaDirectionMemToPeripheral )
01078   {
01079     if ( bufInc )
01080     {
01081       if ( size == dmadrvDataSize1 )
01082       {
01083         descrCfg.srcInc = dmaDataInc1;
01084       }
01085       else if ( size == dmadrvDataSize2 )
01086       {
01087         descrCfg.srcInc = dmaDataInc2;
01088       }
01089       else /* dmadrvDataSize4 */
01090       {
01091         descrCfg.srcInc = dmaDataInc4;
01092       }
01093     }
01094     else
01095     {
01096       descrCfg.srcInc = dmaDataIncNone;
01097     }
01098     descrCfg.dstInc = dmaDataIncNone;
01099   }
01100   else
01101   {
01102     if ( bufInc )
01103     {
01104       if ( size == dmadrvDataSize1 )
01105       {
01106         descrCfg.dstInc = dmaDataInc1;
01107       }
01108       else if ( size == dmadrvDataSize2 )
01109       {
01110         descrCfg.dstInc = dmaDataInc2;
01111       }
01112       else /* dmadrvDataSize4 */
01113       {
01114         descrCfg.dstInc = dmaDataInc4;
01115       }
01116     }
01117     else
01118     {
01119       descrCfg.dstInc = dmaDataIncNone;
01120     }
01121     descrCfg.srcInc = dmaDataIncNone;
01122   }
01123   descrCfg.size    = (DMA_DataSize_TypeDef)size;
01124   descrCfg.arbRate = dmaArbitrate1;
01125   descrCfg.hprot   = 0;
01126   DMA_CfgDescr( channelId, true, &descrCfg );
01127   if ( mode == dmaModePingPong )
01128   {
01129     DMA_CfgDescr( channelId, false, &descrCfg );
01130   }
01131 
01132   ch->callback      = callback;
01133   ch->userParam     = cbUserParam;
01134   ch->callbackCount = 0;
01135   ch->length        = len;
01136 
01137   DMA->IFC = 1 << channelId;
01138 
01139   /* Start DMA cycle. */
01140   if ( mode == dmaModeBasic )
01141   {
01142     DMA_ActivateBasic( channelId, true, false, buf0, buf1, len - 1 );
01143   }
01144   else
01145   {
01146     if ( direction == dmaDirectionMemToPeripheral )
01147     {
01148       DMA_ActivatePingPong( channelId,
01149                             false,
01150                             buf0,                             /* dest */
01151                             buf1,                             /* src  */
01152                             len - 1,
01153                             buf0,                             /* dest */
01154                             buf2,                             /* src  */
01155                             len - 1);
01156     }
01157     else
01158     {
01159       DMA_ActivatePingPong( channelId,
01160                             false,
01161                             buf0,                             /* dest */
01162                             buf2,                             /* src  */
01163                             len - 1,
01164                             buf1,                             /* dest */
01165                             buf2,                             /* src  */
01166                             len - 1);
01167     }
01168   }
01169 
01170   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
01171 }
01172 #endif /* defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_UDMA ) && !defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API ) */
01173 
01174 #if defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA ) && !defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API )
01175 /***************************************************************************/
01179 static Ecode_t StartTransfer( DmaMode_t             mode,
01180                               DmaDirection_t        direction,
01181                               unsigned int          channelId,
01182                               DMADRV_PeripheralSignal_t
01183                                                     peripheralSignal,
01184                               void                  *buf0,
01185                               void                  *buf1,
01186                               void                  *buf2,
01187                               bool                  bufInc,
01188                               int                   len,
01189                               DMADRV_DataSize_t     size,
01190                               DMADRV_Callback_t     callback,
01191                               void                  *cbUserParam )
01192 {
01193   ChTable_t *ch;
01194   LDMA_TransferCfg_t xfer;
01195   LDMA_Descriptor_t *desc;
01196 
01197   if ( !initialized )
01198   {
01199     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01200   }
01201 
01202   if ( ( channelId > EMDRV_DMADRV_DMA_CH_COUNT )
01203        || ( buf0 == NULL )
01204        || ( buf1 == NULL )
01205        || ( len > DMADRV_MAX_XFER_COUNT )
01206        || ( ( mode == dmaModePingPong ) && ( buf2 == NULL ) ) )
01207   {
01208     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR;
01209   }
01210 
01211   ch = &chTable[ channelId ];
01212   if ( ch->allocated == false )
01213   {
01214     return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED;
01215   }
01216 
01217   xfer = xferCfg;
01218   desc = &dmaXfer[ channelId ].desc[0];
01219 
01220   if ( direction == dmaDirectionMemToPeripheral )
01221   {
01222     *desc = m2p;
01223     if ( !bufInc )
01224     {
01225       desc->xfer.srcInc = ldmaCtrlSrcIncNone;
01226     }
01227   }
01228   else
01229   {
01230     *desc = p2m;
01231     if ( !bufInc )
01232     {
01233       desc->xfer.dstInc = ldmaCtrlDstIncNone;
01234     }
01235   }
01236   xfer.ldmaReqSel    = peripheralSignal;
01237   desc->xfer.xferCnt = len - 1;
01238   desc->xfer.dstAddr = (uint32_t)buf0;
01239   desc->xfer.srcAddr = (uint32_t)buf1;
01240   desc->xfer.size    = size;
01241 
01242   if ( mode == dmaModePingPong )
01243   {
01244     desc->xfer.linkMode = ldmaLinkModeRel;
01245     desc->xfer.link     = 1;
01246     desc->xfer.linkAddr = 4;      /* Refer to "pong" descriptor. */
01247 
01248     /* Set the "pong" descriptor equal to the "ping" descriptor. */
01249     dmaXfer[ channelId ].desc[1] = *desc;
01250     /* Refer to "ping" descriptor. */
01251     dmaXfer[ channelId ].desc[1].xfer.linkAddr = -4;
01252     dmaXfer[ channelId ].desc[1].xfer.srcAddr = (uint32_t)buf2;
01253 
01254     if ( direction == dmaDirectionPeripheralToMem )
01255     {
01256       dmaXfer[ channelId ].desc[1].xfer.dstAddr = (uint32_t)buf1;
01257       desc->xfer.srcAddr = (uint32_t)buf2;
01258     }
01259   }
01260 
01261   /* Interrupt needed ? */
01262   if ( ( callback == NULL ) && ( mode == dmaModeBasic ) )
01263   {
01264     desc->xfer.doneIfs = 0;
01265   }
01266 
01267   ch->callback      = callback;
01268   ch->userParam     = cbUserParam;
01269   ch->callbackCount = 0;
01270   ch->mode          = mode;
01271 
01272   LDMA_StartTransfer( channelId, &xfer, desc );
01273 
01274   return ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK;
01275 }
01276 #endif /* defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_LDMA ) && !defined( EMDRV_DMADRV_USE_NATIVE_API ) */
01277
